comments: Polk gives clear directions for her speeches. If you attend every class and work hard, you\'ll get an A. Took her class because it was recommended by a friend and her exams are open notes & textbook but her exams are extremely hard. Speeches are straightforward but she makes you work for it. Take her class if you have time to focus on the material.

comments: She is the best! She is very passionate about her class and about her students. She is very peppy and so adorable! She is clear on what she wants from you and as long as you follow her directions you will pass no problem!

comments: Sherana is a good professor. She is passionate about teaching and goes out of her way to help out those students that have a problem getting in-front of an audience. If you are shy and want to get out of your element this is the professor for you. Exams are open note open book, the exams are tough you have to know what you are talking about.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof Polk is awesome. This has been one of the most challenging classes I have had but also one of the most fun ones. The debates are very fun and the friendly competition drives you to give 100% into your work. Lots of research and writing but don\'t let that discourage you. You will leave this class feeling accomplished and proud of yourself.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof. Polk was very helpful and funny. If you want a good grade on your assignments, don\'t hesitate to come to her office and ask for help. Her debate topics were very interesting. I would recommend to take Public Speaking before you take this class because you will have to talk in front of your class most of the time.

comments: I really enjoyed this class. Sherana is a GREAT teacher. Some of her assignments are tough so DONT procrastinate. She grades very fairly. I really felt like i earned my grade. I would recommend to take this class as long as you stay on top of your work

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  TOUGH GRADER  HILARIOUS
comments: I love Sherana! Get ready to work hard, and be in class. She also gives you plenty extra credit opportunities. Exams are open book/ open notes, but don\'t be fooled by it. Be sure are very clear in understanding of what she is expecting from you for each assignment.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sheranas public speaking class was pretty easy if you\'re comfortable talking in front of people. 2 tests midterm and final which are open book open note but i felt were still kinda hard because thats the only time you use the book. speeches are short longest is 7 min she makes it a pretty stress free situation if you get nervous to speak

stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: She\'s cool. Very passionate about what she does and very educated on the subject. She gives out A LOT of assignments but they are all interesting and fun to work on. There is never a break in her class. The mid term was really hard. You really have to work for a good grade--she\'s tough. But I learned a lot and she has a funny sense of humor.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She has a great sense of humor. But this class isnt for the light hearted. She makes you WORK for a good grade. But she isnt mean. She is incredibly patient and intellegent, which leads to amazing feedback. She WANTS everyone to do well and cares, but if you don\'t care, she won\'t either.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I completely hated speaking in public, but after Sherana\'s class, I feel completely confident! She grades easy at first, but as you progress, she grades tough. Super helpful, and clearly says what she expects of you. Midterm and Final is open book and open note, but make sure you study before! Notes are very helpful. You won\'t regret taking her.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Not a bad class. Her assignments are very confusing though,; I had to go to her office everyday to get clarification. The midterm and final are hard even though it\'s open note and book. Take all her notes in class because you can use them alter on and they are necessary. Bring laptop everyday.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sherana is one of my favorite professors I\'ve ever had! She\'s hilarious, witty, and way down to earth. She\'s so not one of those condescending teachers. She uses really colloquial language. Being a 200-level class, there are a lot of assignments and research to be done, but you learn so much & it feels great getting it all done. Overall, I loved it

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I hated this class when I registered since I had a fear of speaking in public. Sherana WILL turn your fear into motivation like she promises. Every time I walked out of the class, I learned something new and felt happier. There are 5 speeches and 2 exams (1 midterm & 1 final). Textbook is only needed for the exams (open book). Sherana is nice also.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sherana is a great professor. She is funny and very helpful. Unfortunately I have very bad stage fright but I learned a lot from her. We had 2 speeches, 1 town hall discussion and 2 debates. You will need to do a lot of research but that\'s expected. I\'m glad I took this class.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Hilarious! She\'s funny and loud. I love the way she lectures! 5 official speeches, mid-term and final. If you\'re not a good public speaker, this is the right class. I enjoyed it so much. You hear lots of interesting stories about your classmates. In summary, take her without hesitation! Lots of EC as well.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sherana is a very reasonable grader and very clear about what she expects out of a speech. If you appear to be prepared and confident you should have no problem getting a B or above on any of your speeches. She is really funny and helpful if you need assistance.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is a great teacher. She\'s funny and keeps the class very interactive and interesting. This is a 200 level class so there are quite a few papers, 2 debates (w partners), and just midterm and final for exams. We were lucky this semester, she let us do take home exams, don\'t know if she\'ll keep that up. But regardless, the class was awesome.

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: There are different types of speeches we were required to give for this class:persuasive, goals, introduction, informative.They aren\'t hard though.She always gives us a clear outline of what she expects for us to say when presenting.She offers extra credit opportunities to go to debate showcases- 10 points each.Just do what she says-easy class!

tag_professor: Hilarious (7)  Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Participation matters (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Inspirational (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great teacher and very funny. Class was interesting throughout and she is very helpful. Group activities in the classroom make you feel comfortable to speak in front of the whole class. I recommend you take this class if you want to improve your public speaking skills and participate in a very enjoyable class.
